section.title: Introduction
section.p: Mingle is shipped with 3 pre-defined templates and 1 blank template. These templates are useful when you first start a new Mingle project as they illustrate how Mingle's functionality can be used in different scenarios and for different types of projects or teams. All templates exhibit different structures for you to get started with you familiar practice.
section.note: When using templates, please note that changes to project templates are not pushed to existing projects using that template. Changes will only apply to newly created projects.

bullets.item: Kanban template is designed for teams practicing Kanban. It includes a Kanban board, a Cumulative Flow Diagram, and Work in Progress.

Agile template is designed for agile teams practicing a blended agile methodology rather than strictly following Scrum. It includes concepts like Card Wall, Release planning, Iteration Planning. and a Burn-up chart.
Scrum template represents a Scrum approach to project tracking that supports Story Mapping, Product Backlog Management, Release Planning, Estimation, Sprint Management, and Retros.
Blank template is a blank project with a single card type (card) with no additional structure or properties so you can build your project from the ground up.
